content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Smelting Area at position(x=0-2, y=0)
Consists of two stone furnaces working in parallel:
- Furnace 1 at position(0,0)
- Furnace 2 at position(2,0)
Both furnaces process iron ore into iron plates

###Copper Smelting Area at position(x=4, y=4)
Single stone furnace processing copper ore into copper plates

###Electronic Circuit Production Line at position(x=6.5-12.5, y=11.5)
Complex assembly line consisting of:
- Input wooden chest at position(6.5,11.5)
- Burner inserter at position(7.5,11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at position(9.5,11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5,11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at position(12.5,11.5) storing electronic circuits

###Power Generation System at position(x=-9.5 to -2.5, y=22.5-24.5)
Complete power generation setup:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5,24.5)
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at position(-7.0,24.5)
- Steam engine at position(-2.5,24.5)
- Electric pole network distributing power

###Electrical Distribution Network
Network of small electric poles connecting power generation to assembling machines, spanning positions (4.5,16.5) through (0.5,26.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with missing inventory items
- Check inventory before attempting to insert items into furnaces
- Ensure you have harvested enough resources before attempting insertions

### Errors accessing lab entity
- Lab entity at position(0.5,28.5) appears to be inaccessible or missing
- Verify lab placement and position before attempting to access

### Research prerequisite errors
- Check research prerequisites before attempting to start new research
- Cannot research automation-2 without first completing steel-processing research

### Entity status monitoring
- Monitor furnace ingredient levels to avoid NO_INGREDIENTS status
- Keep track of assembler power status and ingredient requirements
- Ensure boiler has sufficient coal supply for continuous operation
